import React from "react"; import "./Login.css"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" import { useState } from "react"; const backdropVariants = { expanded: { width: '233%', height: '1050px', borderRadius: '20%', transform: 'rotate(60deg)', }, collapsed: { width: '160%', height: '550px', borderRadius: '50%', transform: 'rotate(60deg)', } } const Login = () => { return (
Welcome!
Please sign-up to continue!
Forgot Your Password
Don't have an account?
Register Here
) } export default Login
